messages.description: Usage message for the program. {0} is the program name.
messages.C:
Usage: {0} -d [-v] archive file...
       {0} -m [-a|-b|-i] [-v] archive file...
       {0} -p [-sv] archive file...
       {0} -q [-cv] archive file...
       {0} -r [-a|-b|-i] [-cuv] archive file...
       {0} -t [-sv] archive file...
       {0} -x [svCT] archive file...

messages.description: Cannot specify more than one action on the command line. {0} is the duplicate action..
messages.C: Cannot specify more than one action on the command line: -{0} is the duplicate.

messages.description: Missing file name for -a, -b, and -i argument.
messages.C: Missing position file name for -a, -b, or -i.
Missing action on command line.  Must specify one of -d, -m, -p, -q, -r, -t, or -x.
